00028 #ifndef ARGUMENTPARSER_H
00029 #define ARGUMENTPARSER_H
00030 
00031 #include "mex.h"
00032 #include <vector>
00033 #include <string>
00034 #include <typeinfo>
00035 #include <cstdarg>
00036 
00037 #include "Constants.h"
00038 #include "MatlabHelper.h"
00039 #include "Argument.h"
00040 #include "SceneConfiguration.h"
00041 
00042 using namespace std;
00043 
00044 typedef std::vector<mxArray**> mxList;
00045 typedef std::vector<mxList> mxListList;
00046 
00047 class ArgumentParser {
00048 
00049     public:
00050     ArgumentParser(int nrhs, const mxArray** prhs) {
00051         this->argc = nrhs;
00052         this->argv = prhs;
00053         this->maxArgs = nrhs;
00054         this->parseHandle = true;
00055         this->parseConfig = true;
00056 
00057         this->arg = NULL;
00058         
00059         #ifdef DEBUG
00060         string fname = "=== ";
00061         fname.append(mexFunctionName());
00062         fname.append(" ===\n");
00063         mexDebug("%s", fname.c_str());
00064         #endif
00065   
00066     }
00067 
00068     ~ArgumentParser() {
00069         //mexDebug("destroying argument parser.\n");
00070         if(arg!=NULL) delete arg;
00071     }
00072 
00073     void SetArgumentList(Argument *arg) {
00074         this->arg = arg;
00075     }
00076 
00077     void SetMaxArguments(int m) {
00078         this->maxArgs = m;
00079     }
00080 
00081     void SetParseHandle(bool h) {
00082         parseHandle = h;
00083     }
00084 
00085     void SetParseConfig(bool c) {
00086         parseConfig = c;
00087     }
00088 
00089     SceneConfiguration GetConfig() {
00090         return this->config;
00091     }
00092 
00093     vtkPipeline* GetPipe() {
00094         return pipe;
00095         }
00096     
00097     string UsageString();
00098     void PrintUsage();
00099     
00100     void BailOut(string info="") {
00101         string err; //="argument error, giving up.";
00102        
00103         
00104         if(!info.empty()) {
00105             err.append(info);
00106             err.append("\n");
00107         }
00108         err.append("usage: ");
00109         err.append(this->UsageString());
00110         mexErrMsgTxt(err.c_str());
00111         }
00112     
00113     int Validate();
00114 
00115     int ParseConfig(int offset);
00116     int ValidateConfigList(int offset);
00117     
00118     void CheckEqualLength(int count, ...) {
00119         va_list ap;
00120         mxList equals;
00121         
00122         va_start(ap, count); //Requires the last fixed parameter (to get the address)
00123         for(int j=0; j<count; j++) {
00124             equals.push_back(va_arg(ap, mxArray**)); //Requires the type to cast to. Increments ap to the next argument.
00125             mexDebug("lengthCheck: %i\n", j);
00126         }
00127         va_end(ap);
00128         
00129         equalLengthLists.push_back(equals);
00130     }
00131     
00132     
00133     mxList* ValidateEqualLength() {
00134     
00135         mxListList::iterator listIter;
00136         mxList::iterator mxIter;
00137         
00138         for(listIter=equalLengthLists.begin(); listIter!=equalLengthLists.end(); listIter++) {
00139             mexDebug("checking vector\n");
00140             
00141             mxArray *data = *(*(*listIter).begin());
00142             if(data == NULL) continue;
00143             
00144             size_t len = mxGetM(data);
00145             
00146             for(mxIter=(*listIter).begin(); mxIter!=(*listIter).end(); mxIter++) {
00147                 
00148                 mxArray* data2 = (*(*mxIter));
00149                 
00150                 if(data2 != NULL && len != mxGetM(data2)) {
00151                     //mexDebug("LENGTH ERROR.\n");
00152                     return &(*listIter);
00153                 }
00154             }
00155          
00156         }
00157     
00158         return NULL;
00159         }
00160 
00161     private:
00162         string BuildArgumentsString(mxList* data) {
00163             vector<Argument*>::iterator args;
00164             mxList::iterator mxIter;
00165             string names;
00166             
00167             for(mxIter=data->begin(); mxIter!=data->end(); mxIter++) {
00168                 mxArray **argData = (*mxIter);
00169                 
00170                 for(args=cleanArguments.begin(); args!=cleanArguments.end(); args++) {
00171                     if((*args)->GetMxData() == argData) {
00172                         
00173                         names.append((*args)->AsString());
00174                         names.append(", ");
00175                         
00176                     }
00177                 }
00178             }
00179             
00180             // cut away last ", "
00181             return names.substr(0, names.length()-2);
00182         }
00183         
00184         int argc;
00185         int maxArgs;
00186         const mxArray** argv;
00187         Argument* arg;
00188         bool parseHandle;
00189         bool parseConfig;
00190         vector<Argument*> cleanArguments;
00191         SceneConfiguration config;
00192         vtkPipeline *pipe;
00193         mxListList equalLengthLists;
00194 };
00195 
00196 
00197 #endif
